snippet.title: World's Worst Handyman - Official Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Meet Doug, check out chaotic gameplay, rescue cute animals, and take on various jobs in this trailer for World's Worst Handyman, an upcoming stealth comedy game coming to PC in September 2024.

World's Worst Handyman plunges you into a world of comedy and stealth. Play as Doug, a disastrously unskilled handyman with a heart of gold. Embark on a heartwarming mission to save his beloved animal shelter from bankruptcy. As you navigate through chaotic job sites, brace yourself—anything that can go wrong will go spectacularly wrong!
